description: Add a splash of color to the apocalypse with "Trash Punk: Toxic Twilight"! This DLC transforms the game's environment into a purple-tinted, neon-infused landscape, reminiscent of a nuclear wasteland. Explore the classic maps, now reimagined with a toxic glow. It's the same great gameplay in a visually refreshed setting â€“ a simple yet effective way to experience "Trash Punk" in a new light.
name: Trash Punk - DLC#2 Toxic Twilight
